alert.note: Alert for Audubon; Carroll; Cass; Crawford (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 10:07PM CST until February 22 at 6:00AM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Extended Period of Wintry Precipitation across much of Iowa Tonight into Tuesday... .A long duration of mainly light wintry precipitation is set to impact Iowa starting late this afternoon, and then spreading into portions of central and southern Iowa tonight and into Tuesday morning. The wintry mix is expected to transition to snow north by Tuesday morning. The Tuesday morning commute may be affected for many locations due to either snow covered or icy roads. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle is expected overnight. A light glaze of ice is expected by daybreak Tuesday. * WHERE...Portions of west central Iowa. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 5 1 1 app or dial 5 1 1.
